DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Males female Ages 1865 year old Pregnancy lactation H/o kidney disease H/o congestive heart failure , ischemic heart disease , severe pulmonary disease allergy drug H/o cardiovascular disease Abnormal liver function ( liver function test specify range ) Screening urinalysis indicates infection inflammation Taking regular medication ( except overthecounter vitamin hormonal contraceptive . ) Taking supplement , like protein shake Unwilling unable eat chicken ( use protein meal )
